Text:
V 10
A 3

Very quiet audio, you will have to turn the sound up to the max + open up an equalizer and boost all sliders up aswell if you want to hear anything.
Picture quality is perfect fwiw

So here's the specs (didn't just want to moan like an ungrateful fool)..

As you can see, media info is reading the file as 25fps, but YIFY says 23.976, I don't want to disagree as MediaInfo could easily have bugs etc..
